jd: From: Maseera Khan, Absolute IT maseera@absoluting.com Reply to: maseera@absoluting.com Job DescriptionThis role is NOT a traditional PM, as it is entirely functional on the business side (PRE-IT) working on a day-to-day basis with Executives and VP’s to help drive overall process and roadmap initiatives with heavy documentation in assisting to make business decisions. A background in Healthcare background or Retail Industry experience working in large retail chain is a plus.*PMP is not a must but would be a plus. Ideally, they should have CSM designation and 5-7 years managing large, complex projects involving several stakeholders in an Agile environment. Initiative: Working to increase traffic in the CVS Pharmacy Front Stores leading to incremental revenue.This should be someone who has worked in a large Retail organization or a competitor of CVS who can own meeting leadership, information management, executive communications, cross functional team governance, prioritization, and executive level project plans. Title: Pre-IT Business Consultant PM Company: CVS Health Location: Woonsocket, RI – must be comfortable in a hybrid model 3 days per week (Tuesday-Thursday) OR Wellesley, MA office Location Details: 1 CVS Drive, Woonsocket, RI 02895 OR 93 Worcester St, Wellesley, MA 02481Why Open: GatheringStart: ASAPDuration: Budget through 2025, but with a goal to convert before hand if it’s a fit for the client and the candidate but no guarantee’s at this timeInterview Process: 2 round virtual interviews Background Check:7 year criminal (federal, county, state)Employment verification – 7 yearsEducation verificationHours / Shift: Monday- Friday, regular business hoursRequirements:5-7+ years of PM experience: Basic project management – 5-7 years experience with hands on PM experience/pick up on action items/take minutesTruly worked as a PM not just use some buzzwordsHealthcare background (if they have worked at CVS in the past and have a positive reference that is a plus!Nice to have: working in a product modelSoft skills IMPORTANT: Presence, communicate at all levels of the organization, articulate problems/hear and understand issues/experience with documentation.Ability to work with business partners/communicationFlexible/not phased by constant changes & a little chaos Microsoft project used in a PM standpoint (HUGE) – expert knowledge needed Large enterprise experience is a must/someone who is comfortable going to multiple teams to dig deeper/work in a high matrixed organization Excel experienceCommunicate with business partners, but this is a smaller team working with a number of their clients
